title: Another minor Pixel Watch leak shows Wear OS ‘3.1,’ oddly a version out-of-date
content:
The first Google-branded smartwatch is finally on its way, but leaks have been few and far between. Today, a very minor Pixel Watch leak has our attention, primarily because it comes with the detail of running Wear OS “3.1,” which is out-of-date.

more…

The post Another minor Pixel Watch leak shows Wear OS ‘3.1,’ oddly a version out-of-date appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A minor leak of the Google Pixel Watch this week hints again at a coming release, but with the confusing use of "Wear OS 3.1."
